meanings.definition: Cause disorder or turmoil in (a system or process)
meanings.sent1: Loud noises disrupt the class and make it hard to focus.
meanings.sent2: The barking dog disrupts the peaceful neighborhood every night.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel disrupts the bird feeder by stealing all the seeds.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected rain disrupts the outdoor wedding ceremony.
meanings.sent5: The power outage disrupts the entire city, causing chaos and confusion.

meanings.definition: Interrupt (an event, activity, or process) by causing a disturbance or problem
meanings.sent1: The phone call disrupts the meeting and breaks the concentration of the participants.
meanings.sent2: The construction noise disrupts the sleep of the residents in the area.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy disrupts the serious chess game by knocking over the pieces.
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunderstorm disrupts the peaceful picnic in the park.
meanings.sent5: The loud music disrupts the study session, making it hard to focus.
